page.title: 19COMMUNITY SERVICES:FELLING
page.content: {St Augustine's Community Centre}is about 23 years old. The community centre is situated opposite St Augustine's church. It is open all week long. The{activities}consist of: morning coffee, play school for the young ones, whist drives, spiritual meetings, pensioner's lunch club, bingo, karate, indoor bowls and ballet classes. { }It is open everyday from 9am -10.30pm apart from public holidays. A Committee elected annually usually arranges the various activities according to popular demand. A newsletter circulates regularly, informing members of new, existing and cancelled events. It serves the {social}and{recreational}needs of the people of Felling. Though it is run by the Roman Catholic Church it is open to people of all beliefs or none.
